description: This notification is generated when the storm control packet type
rate falls below the low watermark after having risen above the
high watermark. It is generated only once when this occurs.

event.Summary: Storm control packet type rate falls below the low watermark ($v4)

description: Storm control traffic type.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-STORM-CONTROL-MIB::bsStormControlTrafficType

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: The polled value when a notification is generated.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-STORM-CONTROL-MIB::bsStormControlPollValue

description: Low watermark for storm control of this instance. If the rate drops below
this value after having risen above the high watermark, a single
notification will be generated.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-STORM-CONTROL-MIB::bsStormControlLowWatermark

description: This notification is generated periodically as long as the storm
control packet type rate remains above the high watermark.

event.Summary: Storm control packet type rate raised above the high watermark ($v4)

description: Storm control traffic type.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-STORM-CONTROL-MIB::bsStormControlTrafficType

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: The polled value when a notification is generated.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-STORM-CONTROL-MIB::bsStormControlPollValue

description: High watermark for storm control of this instance. If the rate rises above
this value, notifications will be generated at the rate give by the
bsStormControlTrapInterval object.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-STORM-CONTROL-MIB::bsStormControlHighWatermark
